author: rovere
body:
#### Add TICL to Phase2 Reconstruction

This is a [RFC] PR for the inclusion of TICL into the standard Phase2 reconstruction.
It will run TICL by default and save its output products into the output file for several data-tiers. The PR is not yet final and few other commits are expected to come but, as discussed and agreed in the last Reconstruction Meetings, we would like to at least start the review process (at least of the overall code organization) to speed up the integration.

The objects reconstructed by TICL **are not** injected into ParticleFlow by default. A customization function has been provided (`injectTICLintoPF`) in order to swap the _sim-Assisted_ reconstruction in HGCAL with the one coming from TICL.
Non-optimal performances have to be expected out of the box (i.e. quite some development will have to be implemented on top of what is provided in this PR).

The final `scram build code-format` has not been run, yet: we will run it last once the PR is _final_.

#### PR validation:

The limited Matrix run w/o issues.
title: [RFC] [HGCAL] TICL in reconstruction
